post.title: Bootstrap 5 Button
post.description: Buttons provide predefined styles (warning, info, danger) for multiple button types: outline, rounded...
post.body_html:
Buttons provide predefined styles (warning, info, danger) for multiple button types: outline, rounded, social, floating, fixed, tags, etc.

Crucial resources

Here are the resources that we have prepared to help you work with this component:

  • 📄 Buttons tutorial & documentation <-- start here
  • ⚙️ Bootstrap Buttons Generator
  • 📦 Free UI Kit for Bootstrap 5
  • 💽 Free hosting for any Bootstrap project (beta)

Video tutorial

post.body_markdown:
Buttons provide predefined styles (warning, info, danger) for multiple button types: outline, rounded, social, floating, fixed, tags, etc.

-----
## Crucial resources


Here are the resources that we have prepared to help you work with this component:

- [📄 Buttons tutorial & documentation](https://mdbootstrap.com/docs/standard/components/buttons/) <-- start here
- [⚙️ Bootstrap Buttons Generator](https://mdbootstrap.com/docs/standard/tools/builders/buttons/)
- [📦 Free UI Kit for Bootstrap 5](https://mdbootstrap.com/docs/standard/)
- [💽 Free hosting for any Bootstrap project (beta)](https://mdbootstrap.com/docs/standard/cli/)
